text: niqgrAqByA$H stha dEvaqSrutaq Ayu#rmE tarpayata prAqNaM mE# tarpayatApAqnaM mE# tarpayata vyAqnaM mE# tarpayataq cakShu#rmE tarpayataq SrOtra#M mE tarpayataq manO#mE tarpayataq vAca#M mE tarpayatAq&&*tmAna#M mE tarpayaqtA~ggA#ni mE tarpayata praqjAM mE# tarpayata paqSUn mE# tarpayata gRuqhAn mE# tarpayata gaqNAn mE# tarpayata saqrvaga#NaM mA tarpayata taqrpaya#ta mA - [  ]   23
